## Intro to Quarto
This is my first *Quarto* document and it's gonna be lit

## Load Library
```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(here)
```
## Look at the Data
```{r}
glimpse(penguins)
```
## Make a Plot
This is looking at the relationship between **Bill Length** and **Bill Depth**
```{r}
#| warning: false
penguins %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species))+
  geom_point()
```
